title: The Heroic Week of Alice Watson
summary: Alice Watson, a 57-year-old coach and counselor, discovers her telepathic abilities and uses them to avert a crisis in her community, learning that it's never too late to embrace one's true potential.
summaryGerman: Alice Watson, eine 57-jährige Trainerin und Beraterin, entdeckt ihre telepathischen Fähigkeiten und nutzt sie, um eine Krise in ihrer Gemeinde abzuwenden, und lernt, dass es nie zu spät ist, sein wahres Potenzial zu erkennen.
summaryDutch: Alice Watson, een 57-jarige coach en counselor, ontdekt haar telepathische vaardigheden en gebruikt deze om een crisis in haar gemeenschap te voorkomen, en leert dat het nooit te laat is om je ware potentieel te omarmen.
summaryFrench: Alice Watson, une entraîneuse et conseillère de 57 ans, découvre ses capacités télépathiques et les utilise pour éviter une crise dans sa communauté, apprenant qu'il n'est jamais trop tard pour embrasser son véritable potentiel.

story.text: Alice felt an unusual surge of energy as she coached her local soccer team, unexpectedly predicting plays before they happened.
Realizing her newfound abilities, Alice spent the day experimenting and sharpening her telepathic skills.
During a counseling session, Alice connected deeply with a struggling client, helping them overcome a personal barrier.
A sense of duty grew stronger in Alice; she felt compelled to use her powers for the greater good of her community.
Alice discreetly used her telepathy to resolve simmering conflicts among community members, fostering peace without revealing her secret.
Garnering courage, Alice prevented a major crisis by telepathically dissuading a desperate individual from a harmful act.
Reflecting on her week, Alice felt fulfilled and hopeful, realizing her late-life powers were a gift to be used wisely and kindly.

ending: With her community safer and more united, Alice vowed to continue using her extraordinary abilities to guide and protect, proving that heroes come in many forms.
moral: True heroism lies in using one's unique abilities to make a positive difference in the world.
